exec: //NOTE: Inquery with asset id returns more information than using asset number
//NOTE: Inquery with asset id returns more information than using asset number

item.name: Update descriptive Section and Asset Number,Description

exec: //   "P_COST": 23800  // Seems not able to update it
// Add single quotes to field value
// Number of changed units. For example: -8 means removed 8 from current; 8 means add 8 to current.
// Add single quotes to field value
P_DISTRIBUTION_ID_TBL: "'292322,-1'",  //Table to get distribution id: FA_DISTRIBUTION_HISTORY

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:typ="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/commonModules/shared/model/erpIntegrationService/types/" xmlns:erp="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/commonModules/shared/model/erpIntegrationService/">
    <soapenv:Body>
        <typ:uploadAttachment>
            <typ:entityName>FA_ADDITIONS</typ:entityName>
            <typ:categoryName>FA_SUPPORTING_DOC</typ:categoryName>
            <!-- Cannot make "Yes" work. It seems only work with "No" -->
            <typ:allowDuplicate>Yes</typ:allowDuplicate>
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <typ:attachmentRows>
                <!--Optional:-->
                <erp:UserKeyA>LL-20240320-1</erp:UserKeyA>
                <!--Optional:-->
                <!-- <erp:UserKeyB>#NULL</erp:UserKeyB><erp:UserKeyC>#NULL</erp:UserKeyC><erp:UserKeyD>#NULL</erp:UserKeyD><erp:UserKeyE>#NULL</erp:UserKeyE> -->
                <erp:AttachmentType>File</erp:AttachmentType>
                <!--Optional:-->
                <erp:Title>More4apps Logo 1 RGB-0fdsfsdfds1.png</erp:Title>
                <!--Optional:-->
                <erp:Content>dGhpcyBpcyBhIGF0dGFjaG1lbnQgdGVzdA==</erp:Content>
            </typ:attachmentRows>
        </typ:uploadAttachment>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
